PyFoam.RunDictionary.ParameterFile module¶

Working with parameter-files

class PyFoam.RunDictionary.ParameterFile.ParameterFile(name, backup=False)[source]¶

Bases: PyFoam.RunDictionary.FileBasis.FileBasisBackup

Represents a OpenFOAM parameter file

__init__(name, backup=False)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • name – The name of the parameter file
  • backup – create a backup-copy of the file
__module__ = 'PyFoam.RunDictionary.ParameterFile'¶
parameterPattern(parameter)[source]¶

creates a regular expression that looks for aparameter

parameter - name of the parameter

readParameter(parameter)[source]¶

reads the value of a parameter

parameter - name of the parameter

writes the value of a parameter

Parameters:
  • parameter – name of the parameter
  • newval – the new value
